transcript:
what you want to do is you want to build
awareness of when somebody is
overstepping their boundaries and then
you don't yell at them you don't scream
at them you say hey Mom you know maybe
she calls you and she's like oh my god
did you hear about what happened on the

positive and not paying attention to it
oh yeah that's right yeah thank you so

and trying to be more positive and it's
about being very kind but firm not being
triggered not yelling not getting angry
being kind but firm
